item.title: Structure Biology
item.description: CryoEM Single Particle Analysis (SPA) Cryo-EM microscopy 300 kV Titan Krios Glacios: The Glacios from Thermo Fisher Scientific is a 200 kV transmission electron microscope with a two-condenser lens system. | Sample preparation Methods to improve particle behavior Size exclusion chromatography: Gel filtration can be a powerful tool to predict structural heterogeneity. Whenever possible, gel filtration should be incorporated to the final steps of a purification protocol. Protein or protein complex stabilization: If negative stain or cryo-EM analysis reveals significant structural heterogeneity, then the user may consider additional methods to stabilize a structural target in a defined conformation.
